full_summary:
### Instrumented Recombination Cell System
#### Solicitation # WS4067140377-Doc4068118280
#### Amendment # 6

**Published:** July 24, 2023
**Closing Date:** September 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Modification Date:** August 30, 2023

**Contract Information:**
* **Contract Start Date:** September 20, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** August 13, 2024

**Tender Status:** Cancelled

**Supply Requirements:**
The Department of Natural Resources, Canada, is seeking a supplier to provide one Instrumented Recombination Cell System for mixing oil and gas samples into a single phase at high pressure via a hydraulic piston. The system will be used to facilitate the mixing of two-phase oil and gas samples at high pressure, resulting in a single-phase product.

**Notice Document Details:**

* **Posting ID:** None
* **Category:** Industrial Filtration and Purification (40160000)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Not applicable
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity:**
* **Department:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity:**
* **Department:** Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
* **Address:** 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada

**Contact Information:**
* **Name:** Stephanie Way, PSPC
* **Email:** stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** Not provided
* **Fax:** Not provided

**Notice Document URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16958233?extsite=MTY5NTgyMzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16958233?extsite=MTY5NTgyMz
